code: export const TETROMINOS={0:{shape:[[0]],color:'0, 0, 0'},I:{shape:[[0,'I',0,0],[0,'I',0,0],[0,'I',0,0],[0,'I',0,0]],color:'80, 227, 230'},J:{shape:[[0,'J',0],[0,'J',0],['J','J',0]],color:'36, 95, 223'},L:{shape:[[0,'L',0],[0,'L',0],[0,'L','L']],color:'223, 173, 36'},O:{shape:[['O','O'],['O','O']],color:'223, 217, 36'},S:{shape:[[0,'S','S'],['S','S',0],[0,0,0]],color:'48, 211, 56'},T:{shape:[[0,0,0],['T','T','T'],[0,'T',0]],color:'132, 61, 198'},Z:{shape:[['Z','Z',0],[0,'Z','Z'],[0,0,0]],color:'227, 78, 78'}};export const randomTetromino=()=>{const tetrominos='IJLOSTZ';const randTetromino=tetrominos[Math.floor(Math.random()*tetrominos.length)];return TETROMINOS[randTetromino];};
